text: Hello everyone, im still very interested in a solution a HubSpot Designer understands :slightly_smiling_face:
Thank you so much for all your help!
Hi all - I’ve got what I thought was a mobile friendly site that was built custom in HubSpot. Is there anyone that has a moment to help me figure out why one section isn’t displaying nicely?

Hey everyone. I have a weird issue where someone on my team goes to fetch a theme from a portal and all it does is create the local folder. Nothing is fetched. Issue only happens with one particular theme (that we’ve seen). Others fetch fine. However, I can fetch that theme without issue to my local. Any ideas??
